Got questions?
We’ve got answers!

  • What is a VIP or high roller program?

    A VIP or high roller program is a casino loyalty program where casinos reward their most valuable customers by offering specific bonuses, free spins, gifts, and much more. Many casino rewards sites operate a tiered VIP system, although only the players depositing the largest sums are considered true high rollers.
